price: 15.Waxaan idinka feydi cadaabka wax yar. Waxaadse ku noqoneysaan (gaalnimo).
arabic: إِنَّا كَاشِفُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابِ قَلِيلًاۚ إِنَّكُمۡ عَآئِدُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: innā kāshifū al-ʿadhābi qalīlan innakum ʿāidūna
